alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Southern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madison, southeastern Cayuga, northern Cortland and northwestern Chenango Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homer, or near Cortland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cortland, Homer, Preble, Scott, Truxton, Solon, Otselic, McGraw, Cuyler and Georgetown. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
